original_text: And Ishmael his son was thirteen years old, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
korean_text: 그의 아들 이스마엘이 그의 포피를 벤 때는 십삼 세였더라

sentences.original_text: And Ishmael his son was thirteen years old,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아들 이스마엘은 열세 살이었으며,

sentences.original_text: when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 포피의 살에서 할례를 받았을 때였다.
